lead_paragraph: The new look of the Oval Office is angular and modern — it evokes the feel of a den — and tends toward browns and taupe, rather than the gold and yellow tones favored by its previous occupant.
snippet: The new look of the Oval Office is angular and modern — it evokes the feel of a den — and tends toward browns and taupe, rather than the gold and yellow tones favored by its previous occupant.

headline.main: President’s Office Takes On New Neutral Tones, but Keeps Its Familiar Shape
headline.seo: White House Oval Office Is Redecorated
headline.print_headline: President’s Office Takes On New Neutral Tones, but Keeps Its Familiar Shape
